SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class GenericUILogic

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GenericUILogic
public class GenericUILogic extends Object
The class used to represent a generic User Interface (UI). It contains common methods used by both GUI and TextualUI.
See Also:
  • TextualUI
  • GraphicalUI

    • modelModified

      public void modelModified(GameView game)
      Method used to update the model by receiving a GameView object from the Server. Depending on the UI state and different model attributes this method changes the State of the game from the UI perspective.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game.
      See Also:
      • Game
      • GameView
      • Server

    • initializeChatThread

      public void initializeChatThread(ViewListener controller, String nickname, GameView model)
      Initialize the chat's thread. Moreover, this method sets his GameView. The game view is not set in the constructor because we need the value passed as reference instead of the real value.
      Parameters:
      controller - is the GameController.
      nickname - the player's (client's) nickname.
      model - the model used to set the GameView.
      See Also:
      • GameController
      • Game
      • GameView

    • setAreThereStoredGamesForPlayer

      public void setAreThereStoredGamesForPlayer(boolean result)
      Setter of areThereStoredGamesForPlayer attribute
      Parameters:
      result - indicate the result of the query made to the server about the presence of stored games for the given player

    • areThereStoredGamesForPlayer

      public boolean areThereStoredGamesForPlayer()
      Getter of areThereStoredGamesForPlayer attribute
      Returns:
      true if and only if there is a stored game for the player
